questionListItems.title: What time does school start and end?

answer.body:
School starts at 7.50 am. 


Ending hours will depend on the timetable of each class. They range from 2.10 pm to 3.00 pm. On Fridays, school ends at 12.30 pm. The class timetables are posted on the school’s website and are updated every semester.

questionListItems.title: Where should I report to on the first day of school?

answer.body: You are to report to the school hall (2nd level above the canteen).

questionListItems.title: What should I bring on the first day of school?

answer.body:
For lessons, you can bring along some writing materials and a water bottle. 

For recess, you can either bring along some cash (about $3 should be sufficient) or your ez-link card with monetary value sufficient for recess. The school canteen vendors accept e-payment using your ez-link card. 


You should also bring along a water bottle to keep yourself  hydrated throughout the day.

questionListItems.title: What is the reporting and dismissal time for the first day of school?

answer.body:
You are to report by 7.50 am. 


The dismissal time for the first day of school is 12.50 pm. The dismissal time for the subsequent days will depend on your timetable.

questionListItems.title: When should I wear the respective school attire?

answer.body:
On Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays, students should wear the red polo with uniform grey bottoms. 


On Tuesdays and Thursdays, students should wear the beige uniform shirt with grey bottoms. 


For days with PE lessons, students should bring their PE attire and change into them before PE lessons. They should change back into their school uniform or red polo with grey bottoms immediately after the PE lessons for hygiene purposes.

questionListItems.title: What is the recommended number of uniforms that I should purchase?

answer.body:
• School uniform shirt/ blouse - 1 to 2 pieces 

  • School red Polo - 2 pieces 

  • Grey bottoms - 3 pieces

  • PE Attire - 3 sets

questionListItems.title: How do I alight if my parents drive me to school?

answer.body:
The school allows cars to be driven into the school compound in the morning. Parents who drive may drop off their children within the school at the foyer or at the corridor along the ISH. Please be reminded not to speed or overtake and to drive carefully at all times within the school zone. 

The school main gate will be closed at 7.55am. Please drop off your child before the main gate closes.


If you alight on the opposite side of the road, please use the pedestrian crossing located a few meters from the main entrance.

questionListItems.title: How do I appeal for a place in BBSS?

answer.body:
To appeal, please submit your application via https://form.gov.sg/5f96453b2464570011d2fee5

Primary 6 students who have applied to BBSS during MOE’s Secondary 1 Posting Exercise but are unsuccessful, may appeal to be considered for transfer to BBSS. These students appealing for admission after the release of the Secondary 1 Posting result have to meet the school’s cut-off point (COP). For more information, you may also refer to MOE website - https://www.moe.gov.sg/microsites/psle-fsbb/posting-to-secondary-school/faqs.html

questionListItems.title: What is the brand and model of the Personal Learning Device (PLD), chosen by the school?

answer.body: Y2024 Sec 1 students’ PLD is the Lenovo 500e Gen 4 Chromebook (Convertible) 12.2", with 3.5mm in-ear headphones as an add-on accessory. The enhanced bundle also includes a 3-year carry-in warranty and insurance coverage.

questionListItems.title: When can I get my new Secondary level School Smart Card (SSC)?

answer.body: While Secondary One Students are waiting for their Secondary level SSCs to be ready, they can continue to use their Primary level SSCs for concessionary travel till end Apr 2022. Students can still purchase the Bus Concession Pass (BCP) using their Primary level SSCs, but they would need to purchase the BCP for Secondary School students.

questionListItems.title: When is the school able to confirm the outcome of our appeal for a place?

answer.body: Usually by the second week of January. Only successful applicants will be informed by the school.

questionListItems.title: What should I do if I am sick on the first day of school?

answer.body: You should  call the school’s General Office (6379 9413)  in the morning and inform them. Provide them with your full name and class as well as the name of your form teacher so that they can process your attendance. After that, you are encouraged to see a doctor to ensure your well-being and obtain a medical certificate from the doctor.

questionListItems.title: What can I expect for Orientation?

answer.body: You can expect some team bonding activities with your new classmates, as well as getting to know your teachers and the new school compound.

questionListItems.title: What are the types of school attire at BBSS?

answer.body:
There are three types of school attire: 

  1. Uniform - beige shirt and grey shorts for boys, and beige shirt and grey culottes for girls 

  2. Red Polo

  3. PE t-Shirt with black shorts
